>Yeah, it is a little odd. We have an AbstractTe=

Hmm... maybe you wanted somethin=
g like GSBase's EqualsTester, instead. Tests that use assertEquals() must a=
ssume that equals() works. If you want to test equals(), that ought to be d=
one separately. You have some subtle test coupling there that could lead yo=
u to forget that equals()/hashCode() *may not* work.
